original_title: Sailor Moon and the Seven Ballz 2: Return of the Ballz
overview: The sequel to the popular, original parody that shocked the world! All your favorite heroes and heroines return once again (along with a whole group of newcomers) for another stormy tale of intergalactic lust, S&M battles, and a quest for the seven mystical ballz!
title: Sailor Moon and the Seven Ballz 2: Return of the Ballz
